mapper.select: SELECT B.ORG_STD_ITEM_ID AS orgStdItemId, B.ORG_STD_ITEM_NAME AS orgStdItemName, A.ORG_GOOD_VAL AS goodVal, A.ORG_NORMAL_VAL AS normalVal, A.ORG_BAD_VAL AS badVal FROM pd_org_std AS A, pd_org_std_item AS B WHERE A.ORG_STD_ITEM_ID = B.ORG_STD_ITEM_ID AND A.STANDARD_ID = #{filterMap.standardId}
SELECT A.STANDARD_ID AS standardId FROM pd_standard AS A WHERE A.CLASSESTREE_CODE = #{filterMap.classestreeCode}
